attributes.action: Reject the proposal to ammend the minimum driving age to 18 (From the current 17yrs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea that the age limit for driving a car in the UK should be changed from 17 years old to 18 years old is unfair. Please support this appeal to let the PM know that you are not happy. The petition in favour of this polled only a few votes. Mark
